welcome_content: where you can buy and sell, monitor the market or simply follow economic news...

description_cow.title: What is COW?
description_cow.line1: The Cow (Coin of the World) is created using the simplest algorithm: the Arithmetic Mean.
description_cow.line2: We have listed all the currencies from countries and territories that are currently in circulation worldwide and recognized internationally, according to the ISO 4217 standard.
description_cow.line3: According to our statistics, there are 158 currencies currently in circulation, all of which have been converted into Vietnamese Dong (VND). We sum the values of all the currencies based on their VND equivalent and divide it equally to find the average value, which equals 1 COW.
description_cow.line4: With the integration of these global currencies, I believe that COW will be the most inflation-resistant and stable currency in the world. To destroy COW, one would have to collapse the financial systems of all nations.
description_cow.line5: We focus on and develop stability, balance, and security to combat the inflation of traditional currencies.
description_cow.line6: If you find that COW is a potential, reliable, and safe project for your assets, please follow us by signing up and leaving your email to receive updates on the development and legal information of COW.
description_cow.line7: We would also greatly appreciate your referrals of us to investors and collaborators.

popup.title: **NOTICE**
popup.line1: Currently, we are not officially operating and have not been recognized by the law.
popup.line2: The project is only for viewing and consultation to receive feedback and suggestions.To prevent scammers from impersonating COW to solicit crowdfunding from investors or sending malicious links to steal your assets, please be cautious.
popup.line3: All official information will only be announced through the official channel at:
popup.line5: I agree to the terms and conditions.
